<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/73849</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>73849</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>3b96222f-8c72-41ef-a574-14893f8fc2bf#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Burnuszos férfi</string>
            <string language="en">Burnus man</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Burnus Mann</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Homme de Burnus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Homem de Burnus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Uomo di Burnus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ατομο Burnus</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Hombre de Burnus</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A burnusz anyaga jó hőszigetelő, színe pedig jól visszaveri a napsugarakat</string>
            <string language="en">The material of burnus is good heat insulator, and the colour of it protect from sunlight</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hőszigetelés,  hősugárzás,  </string>
            <string language="en">heat insulation, heat radiating,  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Material von burnus ist gute Hitzeisolierung, 
und die Farbe von ihr schützen sich vor Tageslicht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le matériel du burnus est bon isolateur de la 
chaleur, et la couleur d'elle se protègent contre la lumière du 
soleil</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O material do burnus é isolador bom do calor, e a
cor dela protege da luz solar</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il materiale del burnus è buon isolante di calore
ed il colore di esso protegge da luce solare</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το υλικό του burnus είναι καλός μονωτής 
θερμότητας, και το χρώμα από το προστατεύει από το φως του ήλιου</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El material del burnus es buen aislador del calor,
y el color de él protege contra luz del sol</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wärmeisolierung, ausstrahlende Hitze,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">isolation thermique, la chaleur rayonnant,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">isolação de calor, calor que radiating,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">isolamento termico, calore che si irradia,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μόνωση θερμότητας, θερμότητα που ακτινοβολεί,</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">aislante de calor, calor que irradia,</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn:
org:IBCnet Magyarország Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>978</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>73849</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=3b96222f-8c72-41ef-a574-14893f8fc2bf&v=1&b=1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
